title: Anvil-Hope In Hell (Limited Edition)  mp3  320k  a2k 2013
description:
Anvil-Hope In Hell (Limited Edition)  mp3  320k  a2k 2013 What we got....Hope in Hell is the fifteenth studio album by Canadian heavy metal band Anvil. The album was produced by Bob Marlette, who, according to Lips, contributed a lot to songwriting skills and arrangements. The whole album was written by Lips and Rob alone. In some songs Lips was inspired by his love of heavy "rock'n'roll", which made him feel he "found his way home" to the time when they did their first record, Hard 'n' Heavy. Hope in Hell was released on May 24, 2013 in Germany, May 27 in the rest of Europe and May 28 in North America.
